Memberships
It’s about more than golf…it’s about a welcoming atmosphere and a friendly staff that makes you smile. It’s a dedication to making Cypress the best golf course in Palm Coast, so our neighbors feel that this is their home away from home, and our members feel special every time they walk in. Join Cypress and become a member of our Family today!
Member Benefits
21 day advance Tee Time bookings
Complimentary warm-up bucket before scheduled play
Member Charge privileges
FREE Members-only Golf Clinics
10% discount off all Pro Shop & Restaurant purchases
(excludes clearance items and specials)
30% discount on Cypress Logo products
50% off any room charge for private events, based on availability
Walk the course after 1pm for FREE
GHIN Handicap Service included!
Click
here
to view a
Membership Application
Click
here
to download a
Membership Application
Annual memberships run from January 1 thru December 31. Join anytime and pay a pro-rated membership through the end of the current calendar year. Membership does not include cart fees.
Seasonal memberships (for non-Florida residents) are month-to-month for up to six months per calendar year. Membership does not include cart fees.
18-Hole Plans
Individual Membership:
Annual $2,100
;  Seasonal $350/ per month
Joint Membership
(in same household)
:
Annual $3,900
;  Seasonal $ 660/ per month
9-Hole Plans
Individual Membership:
Annual $1,620
; Seasonal $300/ per month
Joint Membership
(in same household):
Annual $2,700
; Seasonal $525/ per month

Course Details
Golf Hours of Operation:
1st Tee Time: 7:30 am
Last Tee Time: 5:20 pm
Walking Golfers welcome 1:00 pm to close
Pitch 'n Putt open 2:00 pm to close
Restaurant Hours of Operation:
Mon - Sun 11:00 am to 3:00 pm
Wednesday Group Clinics
1-hour lesson with our teaching pros
Wednesdays starting at 3:30 pm
Limited to 6 students per instructor
Cost: $25 each
Register by Tuesday noon each week
Tuesday Nine 'n Dine
2:30 pm Putting Contest / cash prizes!
3:00 pm Shotgun Start 9-hole scramble
Register by Monday noon each week

About Cypress Knoll
Purchased in October 2016 to prevent its closure, the current owners have invested their own sweat equity along with their dedicated staff to turn Cypress Knoll into one of the best courses in the area. You won’t find a friendlier place in Palm Coast. Coupled with the scenic layout, it is truly a magical place to play.
Learn More >
Follow Us
Contact Us
(386) 437-5807
Visit Us
53 Easthampton Blvd, Palm Coast, FL 32164

Private Events & Parties
Seating for up to 90 people
Perfect for any occasion
Small details make a big difference
Privacy if wanted…
Weddings welcome!
Business functions too
View from inside the main dining room
Deck is open
View from the deck
Meetings
From small business/working lunches to club meetings to corporate training to business presentations, our dining facility in its beautiful setting can make your event special. Flexible dining options coupled with reasonable facility fees for renting the entire space are available.
Private Events
Whether it’s a Birthday, Anniversary, Shower, Memorial Service, Holiday Party, or other event… You deserve individual attention to make your event truely special.
From 24 to 90 guests, Cypress Knoll is the place to book your event!
Tournaments
With the best greens in Flagler County, and a staff dedicated to making your group’s fund-raising tournament a success, you can’t go wrong booking your tournament at Cypress Knoll.
Catering Options
Click here to download our event planner with full prices!
When you book at Cypress, you book the whole venue. That means you get our undivided attention for the entire afternoon or evening. Our focus is entirely on making sure you and your guests relax and enjoy the occasion, the food, the view, and each other’s company. Stop by or call for an appointment to schedule your event today!
Contact: Janice Nickol (386) 793-0500 or
Floridajfn@gmail.com
